TMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Technician Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 29, 2025, 16:45 IST
 Tata Memorial Centre
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 29-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 23,220 to 25,000




FOLLOW

The Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Technician Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their ITI can apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interseted in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

TMC Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Technician 	01	ITI

TMC Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 25 Years.
The maximum age limit: 30 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

TMC Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

TMC Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

TMC Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 23,220/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 25,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the TMC Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
If you are eligible.
Gather all the required documents for the filled application form.
Carry all the documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.

Address:

H.R.D. Department, Outsourcing Cell, 4th floor, Service Block Building, Tata Memorial Hospital, Dr. E. Borges Road, Parel, Mumbai – 400012.

Important Dates:

Starting date	28-08-2025
Closing date	04-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
